title: Basement Transformation
description: Turned an underused basement into a warm, functional living space with two comfortable bedrooms, a cozy lounge area, and a redesigned staircase to enhance style and flow.

title: Social Area Design
description: Crafted a stunning social area featuring rich wood finishes and beautiful outdoor views, thoughtfully designed to feel both elegant and inviting for seamless gatherings.

title: Living Room Remodel
description: Transformed a living room into a modern, inviting space with a sleek built-in fireplace, clean lines, neutral tones, and thoughtful lighting for everyday comfort and special gatherings.

title: Residential Pool Design
description: Blended modern aesthetics with functional outdoor living in a custom pool design, curated to complement the home’s architecture and enhance relaxation and entertainment.

title: Storm Room Design
description: Developed a secure, custom-designed storm room that offers peace of mind during weather emergencies, combining robust safety features with comfort and refined style.

title: Renders
description: Bring Your Vision to Life with 3D Renderings. First impressions matter—especially in design. At LARQ Interior Design, we create high-quality 3D renderings that help you present your projects with clarity and confidence. Whether you’re pitching to a client or making design decisions, our visualizations let you see the final result before construction begins. Stand out, gain your client’s trust, and communicate your ideas more effectively with professional 3D renderings. Ready to elevate your presentation? Let LARQ turn your ideas into visuals that speak for themselves.
